Lehrseminar
 für Masterstudierende zu aktuellen Themen aus den Gebieten Nanoscience, Photonik, 
Lasersysteme 
und Anwendungen, Nano- und Mikrooptik, Elektronenmikroskopie und 
-holographie, u.a., sowie zu Themen moderner Datenanalysemethoden. Das

Modern Spectroscopies Meet Advanced Data Analytics

'. Seminar for Master students on current topics in the fields of nanoscience, photonics, laser systems and applications, nano- and micro-optics, electron microscopy and holography, etc., as well as on modern data analytics methods. The motto of the seminar is "
Modern Spectroscopies Meet Advanced Data Analytics

". Topics will cover experimental aspects of time-resolved photoelectron spectroscopy, high harmonic generation and ultrafast electron diffraction; state-of-the-art materials such as van der Waals semiconductors; and advanced data analysis methods such as global Fourier analysis, phase retrieval algorithms and machine learning driven data analysis methods.

In the seminar, you will choose a topic at the beginning of the semester and present it to the other participants in a 30-minute scientific talk (+ subsequent discussion). You will receive constructive feedback on the content and style of your presentation.
Language: English (recommended) or German.
In the summer semester 2024, the presentation of the seminar topics and their distribution will take place on
Tuesday, April 16, 2024, 10 a.m. c.t. in seminar room ER 136
. All interested persons are cordially invited!
